title: Geotagging Flood on del.icio.us
content:
So, to anyone who's wondering about my recent flood of geotagged bookmarks on del.icio.us, it's honeymoon research. Sorry if it's getting annoying. I've also been getting quite a lot of sudden mileage out of Yelp.

But, for what it's worth, here's a sneak preview of a small project covered in Hacking del.icio.us. That is, a del.icio.us JSON and Google Maps API mashup. We're using this to get a sense for where things are in town, and how to plan out the days. And, yeah, I know: I've run out of letters. Ugh.
